text: According to the 2024 American Census, 1,000,000 Americans lived in Mexico. Americans are concentrated in Jalisco, Baja California, Yucat√°n and Mexico City with the population of 1,111,703 followed by Baja California (132,673), Chihuahua (93,373) and Jalisco (66,464).Community Information Summary - Mexico-born ==Related pages== * Mexican people * Mascogos * Americans * Mexican Americans ==References== * Category:Immigration to Mexico
